forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind 3 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the city quietly stirs into the early hours, a gentle breeze brushes against the skyline of Downtown San Francisco, a harbinger of the evening’s cool embrace. Tonight, the sky wears a partially cloudy cloak, with temperatures settling around 49 degrees, ushering in the soft whisper of a west-northwest wind. While the night is calm, it gives way to a palette of possibilities for Saturday. The forecast hints at a mere suggestion of rain after the sun begins its descent, yet the day ahead promises a mix of mostly sunny skies with a peak near 58. Expect the chill to inch closer, gradually cooling to around 56 as the afternoon unfolds.

Though the daylight may begin with the remnants of fog lingering like a soft mist at the edges of the horizon, the forecast and recent observations point towards an awakening clarity, inviting exploration of the day ahead. It is a moment perfect for a stroll along one of the city’s iconic streets—perhaps meandering through a local park or finding solace in a quiet café, a warm cup refreshing against the crisp air. As for attire, layering is advisable; a light jacket should suffice against the persistent chill, while comfortable shoes will serve well for any strolls you may choose to take. You’ll find the day to be a canvas of moderate temperatures and wispy clouds, a modest invitation to embrace the charm of San Francisco, framed beautifully against the ever-impressive backdrop of its legendary hills and architecture.
